unit.utterance: Avalaš ke xorus šoru mikonad be ququli ququ kardan baad yek mardi hast tuye ān mazrae
unit.utterance_translation: Firstly the rooster starts crowing, then a man is on the farm

unit.utterance: kenāre deraxte golābi, baad miravad bālāye nardebān golābi mičinad
unit.utterance_translation: next to the pear tree, then he climbs up the ladder to pick pears

unit.utterance: migozārad tuye jibe ān rupuši ke pušide tanaš
unit.utterance_translation: and puts them in the pocket of his clothes

unit.utterance: miāyad pāyin migozārad tuye sabad do tā sabade pore golābi bude
unit.utterance_translation: he climbes down, puts the pears in the basket, there were two baskets full of pears

unit.utterance: yek pesari, aha, baad sedāye boz miāyad ke boze bā sāhebaš az kenāre sabade golābi rad mišavand
unit.utterance_translation: a boy,... a goat bleats, the goat and its owner cross over the pear basket

unit.utterance: vali boze be golābiha negāh mikonad vali xob nemitavand dast bezanad
unit.utterance_translation: the goat looks at the pears, but it cannot eat them

unit.utterance: bad yek pesari bā dočarxei ke dočarxe xeyli malum ast ke az xodaš bozorgtar ast ke nemitavānad ruye sandaliaš benšinad rad mišavad az kenāre sabade golābiha
unit.utterance_translation: then a boy on a bike so bigger than him that he can not sit on its seat easily crosses over the pear basket

unit.utterance: va mibinad marde bālāye deraxt ast havāsaš nist čon marde vaqti golābihā rā mirizad dobāre az nardebān miravad bālā
unit.utterance_translation: and found the man on the tree, having put the pears into the basket, the man climbs up the ladder again

unit.utterance: bad sabadi ke ruye dočarxeaš bude migozārad sabade mard rā xāli mikonad tuye sabade xodaš golābihā rā bā xodaš mibarad
unit.utterance_translation: the boy empties the man's basket into his own which was on his bike and takes the pears

unit.utterance: Bad sare rāhaš yek doxtari az kenāraš juri rad mišavad ke pesare dočarxeaš mioftad zamin xodaš ham mixorad zamin
unit.utterance_translation: on his way, he bumps into a girl, his bike fells down and so does he

unit.utterance: bad golābiha ham mirizad zamin va kolāhaš ham part mišavad tarafe digar
unit.utterance_translation: then all the pears spilled out and his hat is thrown away on the other side

unit.utterance: se tā pesar az kenāraš rad mišavand qadhāšān ham motefāvet bude
unit.utterance_translation: three boys of different heights are passing

unit.utterance: komakaš mikonand golābihā rā mirizand dobāre tuye sabad
unit.utterance_translation: help him put the pears into the basket again

unit.utterance: in migozārad ruye dočarxeaš bad tā miāyad beravad yek xorde ke dur mišavad yeki az pesarhā ke qadaš bolandtar bud sut mizanad
unit.utterance_translation: he puts the basket on his bike, and he leaves, as he goes a little further, one of the boys who is taller than others whistles

unit.utterance: miguyad ke manzuraš in bude ke kolāhat oftāde kolāhat rā barnadāšti bad pesare barmigardad pesare miravad kolāhaš ra midahad beheš
unit.utterance_translation: to say that the boy has left his hat, the boy goes back, the other boy gives the hat back to him

unit.utterance: u ham se tā golābi midahad be in yani be tedāde nafarāt bude
unit.utterance_translation: in return he gives him three pears, since they are three

unit.utterance: bad inhā dāštand golābihā rā mixordand rad mišodand az kenāre ān mardi ke bālāye deraxt bude
unit.utterance_translation: they go while eating the pears, and pass the man who was on the tree

unit.utterance: mard miāyad pāyin mibinad ke yeki az sabadhā xāli ast
unit.utterance_translation: the man climbes down and found out one of the basket is empty

unit.utterance: bad se tā pesar ham dar hāle golābi xordan hastand va dārand rad mišavand
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time the boys are walking while eating their pears

unit.utterance: bad mard ham tuye fekr bude va tekiye midahad be deraxt
unit.utterance_translation: the man was thinking and sits back to the tree
